title: The Todd Starnes Show – September 4th, 2019
text:
Here's what happened today on The Todd Starnes Show:

Todd speaks with Allegheny County GOP Chairman Sam DeMarco about his opposition to a Pittsburgh website that is targeting business owners that support President Trump.

Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with blogger Andy Ngo about how we was attacked in Portland, OR by Antifa protestors and what has happened to him since.
